p.span: DAVID WEINBERGER , co-author of the best-selling The Cluetrain Manifesto, is a commentator on National Public Radio’s All Things Considered and Here and Now, and is a columnist for Darwin Magazine, KMWorld, and Intranet Design Magazine. A former philosophy professor and comedy writer, he has written for a wide variety of publications, including Wired, The New York Times, and Smithsonian, and gives talks around the world on the Web’s effect on business and society.
